text: If "row" is a list, you can do this instead (for clarity):

code: if row[:5] == [year, month, day, hour, minute]:
if row[:5] == (year, month, day, hour, minute):

text: A closing paren is missing at row[2] == day.

code:
if (row[0] == year) and (row[1] == month) and (row[2] == day and (row[3] == hour) and (row[4] == minute):
                                                           ^^^
if row[0:5] == [year, month, day, hour, minute]:

text: That fixes your error and makes the whole thing much more readable.
You have 5 superfluous left parentheses but only 4 superfluous right parentheses.
Add a colon after "hour)" along with the aforementioned ")"
